EditorListener - Interface in imageeditor
Listener for actions performed in the main editor view.
EditorStateModel - Class in imageeditor
This class models the state of the whole editor application.

Constructs a new instance of the editor state model with default values.
EditorView - Class in imageeditor
The main window of the application.

ERASE - imageeditor.ToolType
An enum item representing the eraser tool.
EraserBrush - Class in imageeditor
This implementation of the AsciiBrush interface erases a line by replacing the character at each point of the line with a space, while preserving foreground and background colors.
EraserBrush() - Constructor for class imageeditor.EraserBrush
 
EraseTool - Class in imageeditor
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the erase tool.
EraseTool(EditorStateModel) - Constructor for class imageeditor.EraseTool
Initializes an instance of the erase tool
